Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Lawrence/Pulaski
ShortDescription: Eastbound 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Elston, Montrose, Pulaski and Lawrence: due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Elston, Montrose, Pulaski and Lawrence: due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Pulaski.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
